item.title: Bryce Williams records himself shooting report on air! Video removed soon NSFW
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Davidi2:

No, I’m talking about the CAUSE of this type of thing, not the way it’s carried out. There are countries that REQUIRED you to own a gun, and they didn’t run into issues like this. The cause of this type of thing is not how easy it is to get a gun.

Mental health is another huge issue yes, but like I said very little progress is being made there towards preventing things like this

Read full topic
item.source: Bryce Williams records himself shooting report on air! Video removed soon NSFW

item.title: Bryce Williams records himself shooting report on air! Video removed soon NSFW
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:553103”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=672020.msg4494366#msg4494366 date=1440610609]
The fact that he recorded it even further goes to show that the problem isnt the guns themselves, it’s how we deal with shootings in this country and mental illness.
[/quote]
If he had a knife all 3 of them may have either been able to:

Run with minor wounds/critical wounds
Restrain him
Or it may not have happened at all, stabbing someone is extremely personal and physical.

To say the gun isn’t even part of the problem is ridiculous. That’s like saying removing nukes from war does nothing because war is the problem, not nukes. Both are true, but the tool contributes to the devastation.

I get the whole family/home defense part of it too, don’t get me wrong. A gun would be great to have if your home is being invaded. But the waiting time to get one is something like 3 days isn’t it? Yea, no thanks.

Theres definitely a few things that can be tried before a full on ban is attempted, but sadly nothing is happening.[/quote]No, I’m talking about the CAUSE of this type of thing, not the way it’s carried out. There are countries that REQUIRED you to own a gun, and they didn’t run into issues like this. The cause of this type of thing is not how easy it is to get a gun.

Read full topic

item.title: Bryce Williams records himself shooting report on air! Video removed soon NSFW
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Davidi2:

The fact that he recorded it even further goes to show that the problem isnt the guns themselves, it’s how we deal with shootings in this country and mental illness.

If he had a knife all 3 of them may have either been able to:

Run with minor wounds/critical wounds
Restrain him
Or it may not have happened at all, stabbing someone is extremely personal and physical.

To say the gun isn’t even part of the problem is ridiculous. That’s like saying removing nukes from war does nothing because war is the problem, not nukes. Both are true, but the tool contributes to the devastation.

I get the whole family/home defense part of it too, don’t get me wrong. A gun would be great to have if your home is being invaded. But the waiting time to get one is something like 3 days isn’t it? Yea, no thanks.

Theres definitely a few things that can be tried before a full on ban is attempted, but sadly nothing is happening.

Read full topic

you amerirunts need to get a fudgeing grip on your weapons.

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

you amerirunts need to get a fudgeing grip on your weapons.

No, no. If everyone had a gun, like the camera man and news lady, this wouldn’t have happened. :rolleyes: This is a good example of what happens when you don’t take advantage of our glorious second amendment.

This can never be fixed, even if you outlaw guns. There will forever be a rich black market. Unless the government does something crazy and offers $20,000 per weapon turn in.

@Rodgerwilco wrote:

CNN

Police: Bryce Williams kills self after on-air slayings - CNN

Vester Flanagan, who police say killed two Virginia journalists while they were on air, died at a hospital of a self-inflicted gunshot wound, a sheriff says. Flanagan had used the on-air name Bryce Williams.
